example.parse: (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3FS مرَّت) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (PP-MNR (PP (PREP على) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN السكت))) (PUNC ,) (CONJ و) (PP (PREP من) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN غير) (SBAR (SUB_CONJ أن) (S (VP (IV1P+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:S نبادل) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (NP-DTV (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC الرئيس) (DET+ADJ+CASE_DEF_ACC الفرنسي)) (NP-OBJ (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_ACC التحيّة)) (PP-MNR (PP (PREP ب) (NP (NP (ADJ_COMP+CASE_INDEF_GEN أحسن)) (PP (PREP من) (NP (PRON_3FS ها))))) (CONJ أو) (PP (PREP ب) (NP (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN مثل) (NP (POSS_PRON_3FS ها))) (PP (PREP على) (NP (DET+ADJ_COMP+CASE_DEF_GEN الأقل))))))))))))) (PUNC .))

arg.g: with a better or at least an equal one

example.arg: بأحسن منها أو بمثلها على الأقل
